definition: local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc

sentences.english: Similar opera libretto libretto, changing the length of sentence.
sentences.chinese: 唱詞類似戲曲唱詞，句式長短富於變化。

sentences.english: Chinese Opera was formed in the Song and Yuan Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 中國戲曲形成於宋元時期。

sentences.english: Professional institute of opera performance is one of the earliest professional performance.
sentences.chinese: 戲曲表演專業是學院創辦最早的表演專業之一。

sentences.english: Curing parents by cutting thigh is the common topic to promote filial piety in the dramas of the Ming and Qing Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 割股療親是明清戲曲宣傳孝道的常用題材。

sentences.english: Modernization of the Chinese traditional opera is a focus of Zhang Geng's life-long exploration of drama.
sentences.chinese: 戲曲現代化是張庚先生一生戲劇探索的重心。

sentences.english: The purpose of Li Yu's writing was to raise a laugh and to eliminate worries.
sentences.chinese: 李漁的戲曲創作宗旨就是博人一笑，替人消愁。

sentences.english: The earliest notations for Chinese opera date from the Qing period.
sentences.chinese: 最早的中國戲曲樂譜出現於清代。

sentences.english: Guan Tang Shi Cao said the Chinese opera, literature, classical masterpieces hanging.
sentences.chinese: 關湯戲曲施曹說，文學傑作垂古典。

sentences.english: Li Yu was a drama master of the transitional period of the Ming Dynasty and Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李玉是晚明至清初的戲曲大師。

sentences.english: Chapter Four analyzes the artistic characteristics of the opera works of the two masters.
sentences.chinese: 第四章二人戲曲藝術特點分析。

sentences.english: Now integration get-togethers usually consider mixed drama singing as a fixed programme.
sentences.chinese: 聯歡會經常會把戲曲聯唱節目作爲一個固定的節目。

sentences.english: The relationship between the scene and emotion in his opera is typical of "scene in emotion".
sentences.chinese: 湯之戲曲中的情景關係則是典型的“情中景”。

sentences.english: Music using the Shaanxi Opera bowl cavity in the musical materials are created.
sentences.chinese: 樂曲運用了陝西關中戲曲碗碗腔的音樂素材創作而成。

sentences.english: The novel has to be classified as Chinese opera, film and opera, opera.
sentences.chinese: 該小說曾多次改被編爲中國戲曲，電影和歌劇。

sentences.english: Kabuki and Noh in Japan as the most representative one of the traditional operas.
sentences.chinese: 歌舞伎和能劇一樣是日本最有代表性的傳統戲曲之一。

sentences.english: The traditional Chinese opera competition begins today with the initial special competition of Qingyi.
sentences.chinese: 戲曲擂臺賽今日開擂，首場比賽是青衣專場。

definition: among the people/popular/folk/non-governmental/involving people rather than governments
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
